segments.text: I see the woman so focused on her task of drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost mesmerizing how she seems to be in her own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can’t help but notice the water spilling over from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is growing, and she doesn't even see it!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m surprised she hasn’t slipped yet with one foot already submerged.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, contrasting with the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, that boy is really reaching for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I fear he’ll tip over at any moment, that stool just doesn’t look stable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl realizes the risk he is taking for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They both seem so pleased with their secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, it’s nerve-wracking to watch, knowing it could end in disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope they don’t get hurt before someone notices the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If only the woman would turn around and see the chaos she’s unwittingly part of.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how quickly things can change in what seems like a normal kitchen scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s an ordinary day, yet everything feels precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR
